label: ANFFillLevel
description: Get list of ANF volumes for fill level analysis
queryBody: | where type == 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts/capacitypools/volumes' | project name, id, size=properties.usageThreshold, tier=properties.serviceLevel | order by name

label: ANFVolumeSizes
description: Show NetApp accounts, pools, volumes and their sizes
queryBody: | where type == 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts/capacitypools/volumes' | project subscriptionId, resourceGroup, location, name, account = split(name, '/')[0], pool = split(name, '/')[1], volume = split(name, '/')[2], tier = properties.serviceLevel, sizeTB = properties.usageThreshold/1024/1024/1024, tags
